Package es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.features.global

Class ExternalFeatureGlobalGiniConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>

java.lang.Object
es.uam.eps.ir.relison.grid.diffusion.metrics.features.global.ExternalFeatureGlobalGiniConfigurator<U,​I,​F>
Type Parameters:
U - type of the users.
I - type of the information pieces.
F - type of the user / information features.
All Implemented Interfaces:
MetricConfigurator<U,​I,​F>
public class ExternalFeatureGlobalGiniConfigurator<U extends java.io.Serializable,​I extends java.io.Serializable,​F>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetricConfigurator<U,​I,​F>
Configures a metric that measures the complement of the Gini coefficient over those features unknown by the users.
